item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T04:54:57
item.description:
in reference to:

时间间隔随着成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 卡片写作：重复问题、模糊的想法、主干想法，从中积累思考，时间跨度为几个月

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T04:55:39
item.description:
in reference to:

说某个东西「不是现在读」，那就几个月，之后是几个月之后再呈现…… 电子邮件收件箱、任务队列、个人通信等 我这些想象的核心，是每日都要练习的一种习惯，类似冥想：打开软件，完成软件呈上的微任务。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:05:35
item.description:
in reference to:

记忆：重复回忆问题；时间间隔随着回答成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 过程的流畅性：重复完成简短练习，有许多变体；时间间隔随着成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 卡片写作：重复问题、模糊的想法、主干想法，从中积累思考，时间跨度为几个月；将卡片标记为「有成果」或「无成果」，以扩大/缩小时间间隔 习惯养成：重复简短的反思卡片，可能根据顺序改变，应用于你的日常经验；间隔默认扩大，但可以放缓 阅读队列：一系列 PDF，标签页，书本，总在变换：如果一段时间内忽略某些内容，它就会暂离一周，之后是一个月；比如说「我现在读够什么了」，这东西就会几天之内再次呈现；说某个东西「不是现在读」，那就几个月，之后是几个月之后再呈现…… 电子邮件收件箱、任务队列、个人通信等

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 年度征文 | 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ - 少数派 in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T03:31:33
item.description:
in reference to:

其实我就能找到之前所有提到该内容的地方，而这个地方的「快」是非常重要的。我常常把 DEVONthink 比作是一栋楼当中的地下室或者是楼阁，当我们需要找什么内容的时候，我们能够非常快速地去找。虽然说平常不会去楼阁里面翻东西，但只要它搜索起来很快，你就能够快速地去找到想要的内容。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated r/devonthink - Is DEVONthink worth it? in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T04:02:11
item.description:
in reference to:

I suppose it depends what you want to use it for. I use it for research mainly. It is excellent for document storage and analysts and it has been a game changer for me. Coupled with its ability with RSS feeds and Devon agent, I have to say it is superb. I suspect I’m only scratching the surface of its capability. It is a pretty steep learning curve but it’s capabilities are massive.Have a look at the videos on www.screencastsonline.com there is a free membership for 7 days which should give you some idea of what it is capable of. They were a great intro for me.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Annotating the law | Hypothes.is in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T05:05:53
item.description:
in reference to:

The Hypothesis stream is available in the Atom feed format. It can be used with RSS/feed readers such as NewsBlur or integrated with chat and notification systems such as Slack or used to trigger other events in other systems using services like Zapier or IFTTT

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How many words do you need to speak a language? in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T15:15:11
item.description:
in reference to:

Eight hundred lemmas will help you speak a language in a day-to-day setting, but to understand dialogue in film or TV you'll need to know the 3,000 most common lemmas.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated At What Age Does Our Ability to Learn a New Language Like a Native Speaker Disappear? in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T03:03:33
item.description:
in reference to:

In what could be the most surprising conclusion, the researchers say that even among native speakers it takes 30 years to fully master a language. The study showed a slight improvement—roughly one percentage point—in people who have been speaking English for 30 versus 20 years. The finding is consistent for both native and non-native speakers.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How long does it take to master a language like a native speaker? in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T03:10:21
item.description:
in reference to:

I find that memorizing a number of ‘filler’ words or sentences can greatly increase your ability to come off as native, as well as knowing some expressions and sayings. Instead of expressing agreement with a simple ‘yes’ you could try responding with “you know what? I Agree!” or “I think I see what you mean”. It’s agreement either way but it sounds a lot more ‘native’.

Depending on your use case, it may be easier to create an external tool that uses the Web API to access Zotero libraries, read from (not write to!) the Zotero client's SQLite database, run ad hoc JavaScript within Zotero, or interact with one of the other APIs that the Zotero client exposes (e.g., for word processor integration).

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:33:59
item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). By default, Zotero will automatically retrieve metadata for each PDF, create an appropriate parent item, and rename the associated file based on the metadata. (You can disable these automatic functions in the General pane of Zotero preferences.)

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:27:38
item.description:
in reference to:

蛋白质通常不用于供应能量。然而，如果人体未从其他营养物质或体内贮存的脂肪中获得足够热量，则会将蛋白质分解为酮体以供应能量。如果蛋白质的消耗量比需要量多，那么人体就会分解蛋白质，然后以脂肪的形式贮存起来。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:36:29
item.description:
in reference to:

脂肪是供应能量最慢的物质，但却是食物中能量效率最高的。每克脂肪能够供应机体大约 9 卡路里的能量，比蛋白质或者碳水化合物的两倍还多。

item.description:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How To Take Smart Notes –– Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:00:56
item.description:
in reference to:

Useful learning is to connect a piece of information to as many meaningful contexts as possible, which is what we do when we connect our notes in the slip-box with other notes.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How to Take Smart Notes by Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:07:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Don’t simply copy your notes into a rough draft, but translate them into something coherent and embed them into the context of your argument. As you detect any holes in your argument, fill them in, or change your argument.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated (91 封私信 / 80 条消息) 为什么饭店的大铁锅从来都不粘锅？ - 知乎 in the user temberature at 2022-11-14T09:28:19
item.description:
in reference to:

正常饭店炒菜流程，首先预热锅，锅的温度加热到200-300度，放油，均匀涂到锅底后立即下食材，这时候油作为导热液体，迅速加热食材表面，食材表面水分剧烈沸腾，莱顿弗罗斯特效应主导，形成一层蒸汽膜，达成不粘。

core.autocrlf Setting this variable to "true" is the same as setting the text attribute to "auto" on all files and core.eol to "crlf". Set to true if you want to have CRLF line endings in your working directory and the repository has LF line endings. This variable can be set to input, in which case no output conversion is performed.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Qt编程涉及的术语和名词 in the user temberature at 2022-12-12T16:20:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Linux/Unix 系统里静态库扩展名一般是 .a，动态库扩展名一般是 .so 。Windows 系统里 VC 编译器用的静态库扩展名一般是 .lib，动态库扩展名一般是 .dll 。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 编写第一个Qt程序 in the user temberature at 2022-12-12T16:39:57
item.description:
in reference to:

在 Build 设置界面上，有一个“Shadow build” 复选框。如果勾选此项，编译后将在项目的同级目录下建立一个编译后的文件目录，目录名称包含编译器信息，这种方式一般用于使用不同编译器创建不同版本的可执行文件。如果不勾选此项，编译后将在项目的目录下建立“Debug”和“Release”子目录用于存放编译后的文件。

item.description:
in reference to:

Sections should be large enough to contain enough information to answer a question; but small enough to fit one or several into the GPT-3 prompt. We find that approximately a paragraph of text is usually a good length, but you should experiment for your particular use case.

item.description:
in reference to:

函数本身默认是extern，即该函数可以被外部文件共享，通常省略extern不写。如果只希望函数在当前文件可用，那就需要在函数前面加上static。
